message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. This is a great deal, as you know the product is worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. I believe this price reflects its value to me while staying within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your budget constraints, I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price. I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. This price reflects the value of the product while still being a good deal for you. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've reviewed it carefully, and I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while remaining within my budget.
